title: Market share of leading smartphone brands in the Netherlands 2017 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Sony.
Among all the Races, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and lowest SOME LABEL in Race Microsoft.
The maximum SOME LABEL for 2017 that was found in Race Samsung was 13.67 times larger than the minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Microsoft.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
In Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 7 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding SOME LABEL.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL in Race Sony.
Among all the Races, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL in Race Samsung and lowest SOME LABEL in Race Microsoft.

max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows SOME LABEL on the Y-axis for 7 different Races for 2 groups 2017, and 2018 that are presented on the X-axis.
In Race Samsung, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 41.0 among the 2 groups and in Sony, 2018 had the lowest SOME LABEL 0.0.
Among all the Races, 2017 had the highest SOME LABEL 41.0 in Race Samsung and lowest value 3.0 in Race Microsoft.
Race Samsung and Microsoft had the biggest gap of 38.0 between the highest and lowest SOME LABEL found for 2017.
Among all 2 groups, 2017 had the gap of 38.0 between the maximum and minimum SOME LABEL observed in Race Samsung and Microsoft respectively.
Averaging all 2 groups 2017, and 2018, the Race Samsung is the maximum SOME LABEL and Microsoft is the minimum SOME LABEL.
